qas.question: The law penalizes situations where someone is treated less favourably on the ground of what?

context: <a0_0>The concept of racial origin<a0_0/> relies on the notion that human beings can be separated into biologically distinct "races", an idea generally rejected by the <a1_0>scientific<a1_0/> community.
